turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please order me a coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location can I order you the coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please order from the Starbucks on 5th Street in Saint Charles Missouri?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I can, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like something strong, do they have a Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they do, What size would you like; Tall; Grande, or Venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that Latte hot or cold?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it hot, do they have any special lattes?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For the hot latte you can choose from; Caffe Latte, Caramel Brul√©e, Cinnamon Dolce, Cinnamon Shortbread, Eggnog, or Gingerbread.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Cinnamon Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you have any other requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of milk do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have Soy, Coconut, Full Fat, 2% milk, non fat, and Almond, and

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I please get almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, any other special instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please add whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have an account with Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please use my credit card on the Starbucks account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I will place the order, can I get you anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your order is ready at the Starbucks in Saint Charles.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, can you get me a receipt please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, you will also get a receipt sent to your mobile phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, Thank you!
